name: Super Volley
description:
Choose your champion and play a volleyball tournament unlike anything you've seen before. With 10 unique characters, with unique moves and special attacks, use all your skill to defeat champions from all over the world. The grand champion will represent planet earth in a final game in the arena of the terrible Khaos.

In this volleyball game the ball is a mere detail, use your blows to hit, hinder your opponent and win the match.

  • Single and Couch Play Action and Fight Volleyball
  • A mashup of Street Fighter with beach volleyball
  • 10 characters  with uniques moves and special powers
  • 10 uniques arenas
Important! This early access version has at the moment 5 characters and 5 arenas.  But the team is constantly developing to add all the characters and arenas, along with new special attacks, as well as optimization and improvements to the game's interface and flow. Minimum System Requirements :
  •  Operating system OS: Windows 7 or later 
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent 
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 2 GB available space 
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended(editado)
